briefTitle: Safety of Vitamin D Supplementation in Older Persons

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ambulatory

Exclusion Criteria:

* hypercalcemia
* hypercalciuria \> 4 mg/kg body weight/day
* primary, secondary, or tertiary hyperparathyroidism
* renal insufficiency (serum creatinine \> 2 mg/dL )
* history of nephrolithiasis
* treatment with vitamin D (ergocalciferol, cholecalciferol, calcitriol)
* treatment with anticonvulsants
* Paget's disease
* severe cardiac, pulmonary, hepatic, renal, or neurological disease
* life expectancy \< 1 year
* participation in another trial

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Who Develop Hypercalcemia
outcomeMeasures.description: calcium serum levels measured at baseline and at the end of the intervention (6-months)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D Levels
